item.description:
We have a last minute Meetup in the works here!

We'll be tag teaming a Meetup with a Tweetup with our Friends from AMA Boston Connect.

Video will be the focus and it should be a fun group.

There are a lot of questions and misconceptions around the idea of Video as a social tool, particularly around Viral Video. This TweetUp is dedicated to the questions: What makes Video social? How does Video become social? What kind of Videos are more likely to be social?

Through examples, a two-way conversation and an onsite video experiment of our own, Andrew Penziner, Principal/Creative Director, of Andrew Penziner Productions LLC will add a little focus in this first tweetup on Video in Social Media.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back area of the Tavern
item.name: What Makes Video Social? We do.
